title: --git-opts are not just ignored -- they interfere for create --shared-access
body:
#### What is the problem?
Originally reported https://neurostars.org/t/datalad-throwback-doing-as-im-told/2144
```
$ datalad create -D "Central Repo (origin) Project" -d . --shared-access group --git-opts bare project
[WARNING] `git_opts` argument is presently ignored, please complain!
[ERROR  ] 'str' object does not support item assignment [create.py:__call__:291] (TypeError)
```

Clearly if it is ignored, shouldn't interfere and/or error message should be more adequate
```shell
$> datalad_ --dbg create --shared-access group --git-opts bare project 
[WARNING] `git_opts` argument is presently ignored, please complain! 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev/bin/datalad", line 8, in <module>
    main()
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/cmdline/main.py", line 495, in main
    ret = cmdlineargs.func(cmdlineargs)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/base.py", line 628, in call_from_parser
    ret = list(ret)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 422, in generator_func
    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 491, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/distribution/create.py", line 301, in __call__
    git_opts['shared'] = shared_access
TypeError: 'str' object does not support item assignment
()
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/distribution/create.py(301)__call__()
-> git_opts['shared'] = shared_access
(Pdb) p git_opts
'bare'
(Pdb) p shared_access
'group'
```
